Pile Foundation Company in India

Reliable Transmission Line Construction, Monopole Erection & Stringing Services Across India

Contact Us

At Dwizzy Infra, we are a leading EPC company in India specializing in high-performance pile foundation solutions for large-scale infrastructure and power transmission projects. With years of engineering expertise and a proven execution record, we deliver end-to-end foundation work that ensures strength, precision, safety, and long-term stability for complex structures.

Whether it's a monopole, transmission tower, bridge, or industrial structure, our EPC-led approach ensures engineering excellence at every stage.

About Us

Who We Are

Dwizzy Infra is a trusted EPC contractor in heavy civil construction, specializing in power transmission, pile foundations, monopole erection, special cage fabrication, and large-scale infrastructure execution. With advanced equipment, strict safety standards, and expert engineering teams, we deliver reliable and high-precision EPC infrastructure solutions across India.

Why Choose Us

Why Choose Dwizzy Infra for Pile Foundation Work?

1

Specialized in Power Transmission Foundation and Pile Foundation

Our team has extensive experience working with:

  • ● RIG MACHINE, TMR, WINCH MACHINE
  • ● MANUAL PILE for monopole foundation projects
  • ● Metro projects & bridge piling

Pile Diameters: 600mm, 1000mm, 1200mm, 1500mm, 1700mm, 2000mm, 2300mm, 2500mm, 3000mm, 3500mm, 4000mm to 4500mm

2

High-Precision Engineering

Our boring, reinforcement, concreting, and curing processes are executed with strict adherence to specifications.

3

Use of Premium Materials

We supply and use high-quality, tested materials to ensure long-term structural integrity.

4

Timely & Efficient Execution

With advanced machinery and skilled manpower, we ensure fast, safe, and flawless project delivery.

5

Trusted by Industry Leaders

Our association with Torrent Power, Bajel, Afcons, and Bajaj Electricals speaks for our reliability.

Precision-Driven Foundation Boring

We carry out foundation boring with exact engineering specifications, delivering unmatched accuracy and durability.

Our boring diameters range from 2200 mm to 4500 mm

This allows us to support projects of varying scale and load requirements while ensuring:

Maximum load-bearing capacity

Structural stability

Long-term performance

Safety in all geological conditions

Our Process

1

Site Inspection & Soil Study

Understanding soil conditions to finalize the foundation design.

2

Boring & Excavation (With Suitable Machine)

RIG MACHINE, TMR, WINCH MACHINE AND MANUAL PILE

Precision boring using the right equipment for the required depths and diameters.

3

Reinforcement & Cage Placement

Fabricating and placing strong reinforcement cages designed to withstand heavy loads.

4

Concreting & Quality Checks

High-grade concrete is poured, compacted, and tested for strength.

5

Final Handover

Complete documentation, testing reports, and a ready-to-build foundation.

Technical Capabilities

Large-diameter pile boring from 2200 mm to 4500 mm for monopoles

End-to-end delivery including foundation construction & material supply

Skilled team specialized in heavy-duty monopole foundation work

Proven execution for clients like Torrent Power, Bajel & Bajaj Electricals

High-precision construction ensuring long-term stability and durability

Frequently Asked Questions

Do you handle both material supply and execution?

Yes. We provide complete turnkey pile foundation solutions including material supply.

Are your solutions suitable for monopole and lattice tower foundations?

Absolutely. We specialize in pile foundations for monopoles, lattice towers, and heavy civil structures.

Do you work with private and government projects?

Yes, we handle both government infrastructure contracts and private industry projects.

How do you ensure quality and safety?

Our work follows strict engineering standards, on-site supervision, material testing, and safety protocols.
